survey_name: City Bike Share Program User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess user satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in the city's bike share program, focusing on accessibility, ease of use, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the city bike share program?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for easy selection. Ensure the options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the city bike share program?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using the bike share program? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using the bike share program? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your usual pickup locations?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your usual pickup locations?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike share program?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly and allows for long responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike share program?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with the bike share app or docking stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no format. This can help identify common technical problems.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with the bike share app or docking stations?
